Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.commons

Class CommonTargetCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.commons.CommonTargetCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonDiagonal, CommonEightSame, CommonFourCorners, CommonFourGroupsOfFour, CommonFourRows, CommonSixGroupsOfTwo, CommonStairway, CommonThreeColumns, CommonTwoColumns, CommonTwoRows, CommonTwoSquares, CommonX
public abstract class CommonTargetCard extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the abstract concept of a CommonTargetCard, providing methods for all the actual Common Cards

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonTargetCard

      public CommonTargetCard(int numberOfPlayers)
      Constructor CommonTargetCard creates a new CommonTargetCard instance.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - is needed to allocate the correct number of ScoringTokens, that varies according to the number of players

  • Method Details

    • check

      public abstract boolean check(Shelf shelf)
      Verifies whether a shelf of a Player satisfies the condition of a specific Common Card
      Returns:
      true if the condition is satisfied, false otherwise

    • assignToken

      public ScoringToken assignToken(Player player)
      The function responsible for assigning the tokens to the Players who passes the check for a CommonTargetCard
      Parameters:
      player - is provided in order to only assign one token of a CommonTargetCard to the same player
      Returns:
      the higher ScoringToken available for the CommonTargetCard or null if the Player had previously obtained a ScoringToken from the same CommonTargetCard

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the CommonTargetCard

    • getScoringTokensList

      public List<ScoringToken> getScoringTokensList()
      Returns:
      the scoringTokenList of the CommonTargetCard

    • setScoringTokensList

      public void setScoringTokensList(List<ScoringToken> scoringTokensList)
      Useful for test purposes and for reloading a previously saved game
      Parameters:
      scoringTokensList - is used to manually set a scoringTokenList for a CommonTargetCard
